channel.title: Need help with whitescape
channel.description:
Ok im learning my new server and how to run it...
here are some things i need help with...
How can i make it that level 2 and level 1 mods can turn into npcs and spawn items ?
Im also getting game crashes everytime i teleport..
Please can someone tell me what to do Thanks for looking.

item.description:
@gander wrote:

Thanks!

item.title: Need help with whitescape
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

well theirs 2 ways too do this you can search in the client.class for if (playerrights >= 3) and change that too 0 or move the pnpc command down under the closing bracket for id (playerrights >=3)[br][size=1]Posted at: March 26, 2006, 10:43:07 am[/size][hr]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with whitescape
item.dc:creator: @gander gander
item.description:
@gander wrote:

Yes i know but only level 3 admins can do it…

I dont want that i want it so lvl 2 and lvl 1 can do it…
